spirit_sight.name: Spirit Sight
spirit_sight.description: Enables user to feel the presence of other entities through walls

mend.name: Mend
mend.description: Heal user immediately and slowly overtime.

thorn_spike.name: Thorn Spike
thorn_spike.description: Summons thorns from nearby vines or trees and hurls them.
thorn_spike.targeting_message: Select a target to launch spikes at.

plague_touch.name: Plague Touch
plague_touch.description: Adds ability to infect target on attack.

holy_strike.name: Holy Strike
holy_strike.description: Strike down your enemy with holy light!

plague_bite.name: Plague Bite
plague_bite.description: Bite! Bite hard! An infectious bite.

plague_growth.name: Plague Growth
plague_growth.description: Randomly infect an area area (2) turns with an unavoidable puddle of goop. Will infect target at area.

summon_plagued_goblin.name: Summon Plagued Goblin
summon_plagued_goblin.description: Summon a plague goblin to attack nearby enemies.
